title: How to Make Hair Bands out of Socks

steps.headline: Find a suitable sock.
steps.description: Make it is clean, otherwise you will get stinky or dirty hair bands which will get your hair dirty.

steps.headline: Using scissors, cut off the top of the sock horizontally.
steps.description: If you cut it vertically, it will be too long for your hair.

steps.headline: Continue cutting strips off the sock horizontally.
steps.description: When you get to the heel, you may start cutting diagonally. It won't affect the hair band.

steps.headline: If you want, cut off any excess fabric on the hair ties.
Put the hair band in your hair!

text: Find a suitable sock. Make it is clean, otherwise you will get stinky or dirty hair bands which will get your hair dirty. Using scissors, cut off the top of the sock horizontally. If you cut it vertically, it will be too long for your hair. Continue cutting strips off the sock horizontally. When you get to the heel, you may start cutting diagonally. It won't affect the hair band. If you want, cut off any excess fabric on the hair ties.  Put the hair band in your hair!  Finished.
